00036 /* EdgeSplit modifier: Splits edges in the mesh according to sharpness flag
00037  * or edge angle (can be used to achieve autosmoothing) */
00038 
00039 #include "BLI_utildefines.h"
00040 #include "BLI_math.h"
00041 
00042 #include "MEM_guardedalloc.h"
00043 
00044 #include "BKE_cdderivedmesh.h"
00045 #include "BKE_modifier.h"
00046 #include "BKE_tessmesh.h"
00047 #include "BKE_mesh.h"
00048 
00049 #include "DNA_object_types.h"
00050 
00051 /* EdgeSplit */
00052 /* EdgeSplit modifier: Splits edges in the mesh according to sharpness flag
00053  * or edge angle (can be used to achieve autosmoothing)
00054  *
00055  * note: this code is very close to MOD_bevel.c
00056  */
00057 
00058 #define EDGE_MARK   1
00059 
00060 static DerivedMesh *doEdgeSplit(DerivedMesh *dm, EdgeSplitModifierData *emd, Object *UNUSED(ob))
00061 {
00062     DerivedMesh *result;
00063     BMesh *bm;
00064     BMEditMesh *em;
00065     BMIter iter;
00066     BMEdge *e;
00067     float threshold = cos((emd->split_angle + 0.00001) * M_PI / 180.0);
00068 
00069     em = DM_to_editbmesh(dm, NULL, FALSE);
00070     bm = em->bm;
00071 
00072     BM_mesh_normals_update(bm, FALSE);
00073     BMO_push(bm, NULL);
00074     
00075     if (emd->flags & MOD_EDGESPLIT_FROMANGLE) {
00076         BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00077             /* check for 1 edge having 2 face users */
00078             BMLoop *l1, *l2;
00079             if ( (l1= e->l) &&
00080                  (l2= e->l->radial_next) != l1)
00081             {
00082                 if (dot_v3v3(l1->f->no, l2->f->no) < threshold) {
00083                     BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, EDGE_MARK);
00084                 }
00085             }
00086         }
00087     }
00088     
00089     if (emd->flags & MOD_EDGESPLIT_FROMFLAG) {
00090         BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00091             /* check for 2 or more edge users */
00092             if ((e->l) &&
00093                 (e->l->next != e->l))
00094             {
00095                 if (!BM_elem_flag_test(e, BM_ELEM_SMOOTH)) {
00096                     BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, EDGE_MARK);
00097                 }
00098             }
00099         }
00100     }
00101     
00102     BMO_op_callf(bm, "edgesplit edges=%fe", EDGE_MARK);
00103     
00104     BMO_pop(bm);
00105 
00106     /* BM_mesh_validate(bm); */ /* for troubleshooting */
00107 
00108     BLI_assert(em->looptris == NULL);
00109     result = CDDM_from_BMEditMesh(em, NULL, TRUE, FALSE);
00110     BMEdit_Free(em);
00111     MEM_freeN(em);
00112     
00113     return result;
00114 }
00115 
00116 static void initData(ModifierData *md)
00117 {
00118     EdgeSplitModifierData *emd = (EdgeSplitModifierData*) md;
00119 
00120     /* default to 30-degree split angle, sharpness from both angle & flag */
00121     emd->split_angle = 30;
00122     emd->flags = MOD_EDGESPLIT_FROMANGLE | MOD_EDGESPLIT_FROMFLAG;
00123 }
00124 
00125 static void copyData(ModifierData *md, ModifierData *target)
00126 {
00127     EdgeSplitModifierData *emd = (EdgeSplitModifierData*) md;
00128     EdgeSplitModifierData *temd = (EdgeSplitModifierData*) target;
00129 
00130     temd->split_angle = emd->split_angle;
00131     temd->flags = emd->flags;
00132 }
00133 
00134 static DerivedMesh *edgesplitModifier_do(EdgeSplitModifierData *emd,
00135                      Object *ob, DerivedMesh *dm)
00136 {
00137     if (!(emd->flags & (MOD_EDGESPLIT_FROMANGLE | MOD_EDGESPLIT_FROMFLAG)))
00138         return dm;
00139 
00140     return doEdgeSplit(dm, emd, ob);
00141 }
00142 
00143 static DerivedMesh *applyModifier(
00144         ModifierData *md, Object *ob, DerivedMesh *derivedData,
00145         int UNUSED(useRenderParams), int UNUSED(isFinalCalc))
00146 {
00147     DerivedMesh *result;
00148     EdgeSplitModifierData *emd = (EdgeSplitModifierData*) md;
00149 
00150     result = edgesplitModifier_do(emd, ob, derivedData);
00151 
00152     if (result != derivedData)
00153         CDDM_calc_normals(result);
00154 
00155     return result;
00156 }
00157 
00158 static DerivedMesh *applyModifierEM(ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00159                         struct BMEditMesh *UNUSED(editData),
00160                         DerivedMesh *derivedData)
00161 {
00162     return applyModifier(md, ob, derivedData, 0, 1);
00163 }

00167     /* name */              "EdgeSplit",
00168     /* structName */        "EdgeSplitModifierData",

00170     /* type */              eModifierTypeType_Constructive,

00172                             | eModifierTypeFlag_AcceptsCVs
00173                             | eModifierTypeFlag_SupportsMapping
00174                             | eModifierTypeFlag_SupportsEditmode
00175                             | eModifierTypeFlag_EnableInEditmode,
00176 
00177     /* copyData */          copyData,
00178     /* deformVerts */       NULL,
00179     /* deformMatrices */    NULL,
00180     /* deformVertsEM */     NULL,
00181     /* deformMatricesEM */  NULL,
00182     /* applyModifier */     applyModifier,
00183     /* applyModifierEM */   applyModifierEM,
00184     /* initData */          initData,
00185     /* requiredDataMask */  NULL,
00186     /* freeData */          NULL,
00187     /* isDisabled */        NULL,
00188     /* updateDepgraph */    NULL,
00189     /* dependsOnTime */     NULL,
00190     /* dependsOnNormals */  NULL,
00191     /* foreachObjectLink */ NULL,
00192     /* foreachIDLink */     NULL,
00193     /* foreachTexLink */    NULL,
00194 };
